lines.text: Then it's true.
Everything is true. God's an Astronaut. Oz is Over the Rainbow, and Midian is where the monsters live.

[to Lori]
What is below, stays below. That is the Law.

[smirking]
Quite a dance huh? Death everywhere and you and me in the middle!
Did they kick you out? Is that why you hate 'em so much?

[Chuckles]
I'm not one of them... I'm here to destroy them.
[Wearily]

See I've cleaned up a lot of breeders, families like cesspools; filth making filth making filth. And I did it over and over and over again, but it was all leading me here... I was born to destroy them... and the breed together.

[Last lines]
You're crazy!
No I'm death... plain and simple
[now enraged]
Say It
[getting no response he stabs the man]

[sighs]
Then don't say it!
It's Shangra-La on Dope. We love it!
You don't understand! I've killed people.
Who told you that?
What do you mean?
He lied, Asshole!
Decker... isn't this where the dead are supposed to be/go?
But you're not dead?

[Passing out]
Boone
No you're wrong Decker... we're both dead!
[Decker stabs him, Boone just winces and smirks]
You see... blades are no better than bullets!
Aaron Boone... the Tribes of the Moon embrace you!
You are a freak and a cannibal and you've come to the wrong town.
Miss Winston, EVERYBODY has a secret face!
Run while you still got legs!
There's a bad man in our house.
Oh Lori
How do you know my name?
Oh that's a good question
[takes off his mask]
Here's the answer! Boone's alive Lori... and your death is going to bring him out of hiding
Lie still... it's quicker this way

[Sneering... as Decker falls from a cliff]
One last dance!
You heard what he said
What chance have we got... they're armed
So am I
Look we can make it out... but we need fighters
We're not warriors
What about the beserkers?
Madness, they're uncontrollable
Better yet... let them out. We are the tribes of the moon... you said so

[Reminiscing]
The tribes of the moon
[pauses then reluctantly]
I'll release them
We've got the perfect weapon, right over our heads!
Yeah. Just until it goes DOWN.
Never touched a legend before!
I saw their god master... He burned me! I want to burn him back!
[as Decker screams... returning to life]
Halleujiah, Halleujiah, Halleujiah, Halleujiah...
Are you going to kill him or not? Only I want his balls, and his eyes... unless you want them.
I'll pass
Remember me doctor? I was dying when you had your way with me. You made me give up my secrets when I was feeling particularly vunerable...
[Pulls out a set of blades]
Now

[as a shotgun is pointed at him]
You don't want to do that
Gimme a reason?
I'll give you two

[having captured Boone]
If we eat him, we break the law!
Oh, fuck the law! I want meat!
